moves.1. e4: Hi everyone. This is also one of my best game i won against higher rated player. I'm White in this game playing my usual opening.
moves.1... e5: And the usual response almost every player does..
moves.2. Nc3 Bb4: Wow. It seems my opp. is very aggressive in nature of play..
moves.3. Nf3 Nc6 4. a3 Bc5 5. b4 Bd6 6. d4: I wanna started exchange some pieces and ultimately develop some pieces to attack...
moves.6... Nf6 7. Bb5 O-O 8. Bxc6 exd4 9. Qxd4: i dont know whats my opp. plan here..
moves.10. Bd5: Anyway i dont wannna lose my material. so retreat....
moves.10... c6 11. Bb3 Bc7 12. Bb2 Bb6: Nice move.. However, i dont wanna go back... So..
moves.14. Ke2 Qb6: Plan to mate in a few moves.. I guess.. My further moves are very sensitive and i dont want his Queen to come on e3. So...
moves.17. Bxf6: This exchange of pieces is very important for me...
moves.17... gxf6 18. Nxe3 a5 19. Qxf6: Setting up my pieces for mate...
moves.19... axb4 20. Nf5: Here i make my pieces ready for mate....
moves.21. c4 Qxf5: Yes... He has to.. as the only way to avoid mate.. Sacrifice his QUEEN...
moves.23. Kf2 d5 24. Qg5+ Kf8 25. Qh6+: Further moves, i made it conditional as my opp. cant avoid a mate...
